article_title: The Search for the Next Big Idea in Magnetic Field Mapping
article_description: A new competition challenges scientists to innovate on how we map Earth s constantly shifting magnetic field and make navigation safer and more accurate
article_content: The model doesnt just help you get from the office to Taco Bell  Ships and planescivilian and militaryalso rely on it  One of NGAs biggest customers is the military  says Paniccia  If youre sailing across the ocean in an aircraft carrier  its very important y   3538 chars
